name: Achates
description: A faithful healer following a sacred oath
story: Second daughter of Rosvalt, an adviser to the former king of Ezera, Achates joined the Holy Order of the Blue Cross with the wish to save the world through the Goddess's mercy. She has little to do with her older sister, heir to the family name, and seems to be holding some discontent within her heart.
mission_specialty_description: Heals all wounds with the power of light.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_2_description: Recovers an ally's Health and grants a barrier for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered and barrier strength are proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants invincibility for 1 turn, before decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Dispels debuffs from all allies before healing them. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Adlay
description: A daydreaming student dreaming of becoming a legendary hero
story: A young boy with wild dreams of becoming a legendary hero, or meeting the Heir of the Covenant, in reality Adlay is a rather plain and timid student. He wants to stand out but very ordinary.
mission_specialty_description: Believing himself to be a legendary warrior, he uses his power to overcome adversity.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.

name: Adventurer Ras
description: A living legend of Orbis who renounced his holiness
story: Faced with an otherworldly threat, Ras renounced his holiness and became Human in order to save Orbis. Now that he understands the true nature of power, he is able to fully utilize those granted to him by Diche and Ilryos as he looks ahead to new adventures.
mission_specialty_description: The love and blessings of the gods of Aethra remain with him.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increase proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Ains
description: A reckless backstreet brawler
story: A fighter known among the criminal underground as the Aakhen Outlaw, Ains has committed a lot of crimes with his simple and bravado-driven personality. He once had a strong reputation for taking care of the people around him, but after escaping prison he became incredibly selfish.
mission_specialty_description: Under any circumstances, he makes decisions based only on his own interests.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Punches the enemy, with a 50% chance to use Satisfying Strike instead of Gazelle Punch.\nSatisfying Strike	:	 A successful attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Aither
description: The Kingdom's lovable, enthusiastic prince!
story: Aither is the royal child of Ezera. He is bright and energetic, but he does not like those people who treat him as a weak boy. He desires to make his name as a brave knight one day, just like his mother.
mission_specialty_description: With his warm touch, there's nothing he can't heal.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_2_description: Recovers an ally's Health with water energy while dispelling two debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_description: Recovers Health of all allies and casts a barrier for 1 turn with spirit power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, and barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Recovers Health of all allies and casts a barrier for 2 turns with spirit power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health, and barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Alencia
description: A pureblood who sees Humans as inferior
story: Maternal aunt of Luna and Yufine, who believes that Dragons are the wisest and most graceful beings in the world. As she considers it inelegant to have frequent mood swings like lowly creatures do, she tends to be kind to others unless they cross a line.
mission_specialty_description: Dragons are greedy for new knowledge.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Defense of the target for 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with Dragon's might, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with Dragon's Might, dispelling all buffs and granting increased Defense to all allies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Alexa
description: A faithful and honest member of the Order of the Sword
story: Despite her young age, Alexa has managed to become a formally appointed knight of the Order of the Sword trusted with all kinds of duties. She greatly admires Iseria, who taught her how to use a sword.
mission_specialty_description: She's contributed greatly to helping knights in their development.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will have a 50% chance of granting an extra attack. Can only be activated once per turn.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Cuts the enemy with dual-wielded swords. A critical hit will grant an extra attack. Can only be activated once per turn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy continuously, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

name: All-Rounder Wanda
description: An all-rounder with a wealth of experience
story: Wanda has come to realize that her inability to concentrate on only one thing also makes her extremely capable of handling many things at once. With the knowledge and skills she has acquired so far, she decides to advertise herself as a mercenary capable of taking requests of any kind.
mission_specialty_description: She's more capable than people give her credit for.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.

name: Ambitious Tywin
description: Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos who seeks only to rise in station
story: Arrogant and cruel, he sees others only as pawns to be used for his own ends. He's so skilled at managing his reputation that he's known as a reliable and loyal knight despite his true nature.
mission_specialty_description: When handling a well-forged sword, one must be cautious to avoid cutting oneself.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Angelic Montmorancy
description: A hardworking nun doing her best to help weak and poor souls
story: Even after being formally appointed a nun, Montmorancy keeps making mistakes. However, instead of blaming herself and asking others for help, she perseveres in her efforts to help others.
mission_specialty_description: Her gentle touch will drive pain away.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Effect is granted to all allies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, dispelling two debuffs, before increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

name: Angelica
description: The carefree High Priestess of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross
story: High Priestess of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Angelica is a healer of incredible divine power. Despite her youthful appearance, she is the most senior member of the Conclave.
mission_specialty_description: Her light will shine on you to guide you through darkness.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_2_description: Recovers ally's Health with healing power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Recovers ally's Health, as well as that of another ally with the least Health, with healing power. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Recovers the Health of all allies and grants a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength are proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 2 turns.

name: Apocalypse Ravi
description: A girl born amidst calamity, revered as the god of war
story: Originally born in a small village, she was chosen to become an incarnation of the god of war, before accidentally falling into another dimension while fighting an enemy general. She has no memories of her life before she was deified.
mission_specialty_description: Wherever she goes, pandemonium follows.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with an axe, absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Greatly increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Skill_2_description: Consumes 10 Fighting Spirit to recover Health after being attacked. Starts the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Increases Critical Hit Chance by 30%.
Skill_3_description: Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When an enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 5% Health before granting skill nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Delivers divine judgment down upon the enemy. When an enemy is defeated, revives one random dead ally with 10% Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 100% before granting Skill Nullifier once. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Aramintha
description: Leader of the Phantom CIC, Unknown investigators
story: Aramintha is a gentle and cheerful woman, and leader of the Phantom CIC, a group dedicated to investigating the Unknown to whom she lost her husband. She is an incredible fighter, but often gets caught up bragging about her husband when she's not in a battle.
mission_specialty_description: She is cold-hearted and resolute in achieving her goals.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_2_description: Sprinkles a catalyst, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When an enemy is burned, the catalyst will explode and deal damage to all enemies, making them unhealable for 2 turns.

name: Arbiter Vildred
description: A knight who has embraced the boundless power of darkness
story: Once among the greatest of believers in the Goddess and her Covenant, Arbiter Vildred joined hands with the Acolyte Kayron and betrayed everyone and everything he once believed in. Within his body is contained the power of the Archdemon Anghraf.
mission_specialty_description: Neither truth nor lie matters to his offer.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns. When Focus is full, consumes it all, increasing damage dealt. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

name: Archer's Vision
description: A book said to contain the secret behind becoming an ace marksman.
story: Though small in stature, Helga is a fierce eyed bounty hunter who is never without her trademark axe and horned helm. Rough-spoken and rough-tempered, she has no time for those who look down on her, and prefers to work alone.
mission_specialty_description: She shows no hesitation while defeating her enemies.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Encourages allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Archer's Vision
description: A book said to contain the secret behind becoming an ace marksman.
story: Initially skeptical of Gunther's kindness, Helga eventually came to realize his sincerity. At his suggestion, she joins his mercenary company, but is flustered to learn she is the only member.
mission_specialty_description: She shows no hesitation in defeating her enemies.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will have a 50% chance to extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Strongly slams the enemy with an axe. A critical hit will extend any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Encourages all allies, increasing Attack and Effectiveness of all allies for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Armin
description: Unmatched in her bravery, commander of the Longtail Company
story: A particularly ticklish feline Suin, Armin is the valiant and cheerful Commander of the Longtail Company. However, she is easily tempted, and quickly convinced to go along with the whims of her fellow mercenaries. She loves to collect earrings but since her ears are so sensitive she's unable to actually wear them.
mission_specialty_description: Handles requests with diligence and efficiency.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Covers all allies with the Shield of Light and grants a barrier for 3 turns before recovering Health. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Defense, and amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is unavailable. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Arowell
description: A bodyguard who will protect her lady at any cost
story: Doris Rutton's personal bodyguard, Arowell often comes off as stiff due to her serious personality. She is willing to follow Doris anywhere, and will protect her at any cost.
mission_specialty_description: In order to defend your client, some basic hunting is required.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Grants a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns at the start of battle and at the start of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Assassin Cartuja
description: A judge presiding over a world full of thrills
story: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Cartuja is an optimistic thrill seeker who finds great joy in observing the world.
mission_specialty_description: His accomplishments as a warrior and hunter number as many as his scars.
Skill_3_description: Dashes towards the enemy to attack, stunning for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Dashes towards the enemy to attack, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases Defense for 2 turns.

name: Assassin Cidd
description: Eligos's faithful dog with a sad past
story: A boy who spent his days looking for a place where he belonged, until Eligos took him in.
mission_specialty_description: He will do whatever it takes to fulfill his given mission.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful ground pound, silencing them for 1 turn and decreasing their Combat Readiness by 50%, before increasing Evasion Chance of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. Removes 20 Souls from the opponent.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy with a powerful ground pound, silencing them for 1 turn and decreasing their Combat Readiness by 50%, before increasing Evasion Chance of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster and enemy's Speed. Removes 20 Souls from the opponent.

name: Assassin Coli
description: An agile assassin hiding in the silence
story: A silent assassin in the shadows, it is said that anyone who sees the glint of Assassin Coli's blade in the moonlight will not live much longer.
mission_specialty_description: Victory becomes hers in the blink of an eye.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Ambushes the enemy, dealing additional damage and increasing Speed of the caster for 1 turn when stealthed. Damage dealt also increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, silencing all enemies for 1 turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Moves silently to attack the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. Silences all enemies for 1 turn when the target is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

name: Auxiliary Lots
description: The first magical doll to be created in Reingar
story: A magical doll modeled on Lots. Compared to the original Lots, this doll is extremely competitive and desperate for recognition, and so participates in as many activities around Reingar as possible.
mission_specialty_description: Expressionless, with little patience. Disobeying his orders will bring swift punishment.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a magic sphere, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 15%.

name: Azalea
description: A faithful officer with a duty to maintain order
story: An officer of the Reingar Public Security Club, Azalea is mainly responsible for guarding the library and catching book thieves. Despite being trusted with many leadership duties, she has a history of continuously failing to be appointed to the Student Council.
mission_specialty_description: With sharp eyes, she thwarts those that would do evil.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_1_description: Stabs the enemy with a spear and recovers own Health proportional to max Health.

name: Baal & Sezan
description: A great magician-turned-doll, and her faithful apprentice
story: Sezan was once a dark magician, until her body was destroyed in a forbidden summoning ceremony gone awry. Before her soul also perished, her apprentice Baal placed it inside a doll, and together they have embarked on a long journey to return her soul to a Human body.
mission_specialty_description: Baal & Sezan don't back down easily; something in their hearts just won't let them.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Summons the Cloud of Darkness to attack all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy. When the enemy is defeated by this attack, the cooldown for Last Requiem is reset.

name: Baiken
description: A one-armed, one-eyed samurai dreaming of revenge
story: She lost her family and friends in a Gear attack led by That Man. From that point on she walked the path of Asura, obsessed with exacting revenge on That Man. Tough and decisive, she boasts fighting power that can rival even that of a Gear.
mission_specialty_description: One day she will get revenge on That Man for what he did to her.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.

name: Basar
description: A genius holding sway over the economy of an entire continent
story: Leader of one of the six biggest merchant guilds in Savara, Basar is a seller of poisons and explosives. A genius of business, at a young age he has gained enough power to compare with the great Afih Merchant Guild.
mission_specialty_description: You need passion to become rich.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs and decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with sand magic, dispelling all buffs and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%.

name: Bask
description: An impious knight of the Order of the Sword
story: With no particular religious faith, and wishing solely to become stronger, he joined the Order of the Sword. His only goal is to have his name remembered by future generations as a powerful knight and he cannot understand anyone who dies in the service of faith or personal beliefs.
mission_specialty_description: He's always training, determined to become the strongest knight.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Covers all allies with the Will of Protection, granting immunity for 3 turns, before granting a barrier to the caster for 3 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Batisse
description: A tragic fighter craving power
story: Batisse gained incredible power after using his teacher, Hataan, and other companions to obtain the Fighter's Mask. Intoxicated by that power, he murdered them all except for Hataan and disappeared. As time passed, the power the mask gave him grew stronger, but in return, his sense of self is becoming increasingly blurred.
mission_specialty_description: He can never give up his quest for power, even though he knows that it will be his doom.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_1_description: Hits the enemy in the face. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, activates Rock Smash.\nRock Smash	:	 Attacks all enemies.
Skill_1_soul_description: Activates Rock Smash even when used against enemy without decreased Attack.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy with blindingly fast speed. When used against an enemy inflicted with decreased Attack, decreases Defense for 2 turns.

name: Bellona
description: A noble lady of Ezera yearning for freedom
story: Daughter of a noble Ezeran family, Bellona ran away from home, refusing to be forced into an arranged marriage. After joining the Phantom CIC she appears to be much more satisfied with her new life, where she can fight as many strong enemies as she likes and hone her skills.
mission_specialty_description: After leaving her family mansion, she hopes to learn much about the outside world.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a fan, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health. When the caster's stacked Focus is 5 or more, consumes all Focus and activates Razorwind Fan.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies by waving a fan. Damage dealt increases with more enemies.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies by waving a fan. Damage dealt increases with more enemies. Grants the caster immunity for 1 turn after attacking.

name: Benevolent Romann
description: Knight Commander of Lefundos who is kind to everyone
story: Though he treats everyone with gentleness and kindness, he won't hesitate to do anything for his friend Ervalen, no matter how cruel. To him, Schniel is nothing more than a troublemaker, while Ervalen is a trustworthy liege deserving of unconditional loyalty.
mission_specialty_description: There are no lengths he will not go to when it comes to those close to him.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with concentrated mana, before a 35% chance to activate Mana Burst. Effect chance is doubled when the target is silenced.\nMana Burst	:	 Attacks all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by a random amount between 10% and 50%.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases chance of activating Mana Burst to 100%.

name: Black Curse Powder
description: A catalyst used by a high-level mage, containing a powerful curse.
story: A swordsman of the Perland Raiders, born into a noble Perland family. Though Violet may appear elegant, he behaves anything but. While incredibly skilled, he has few friends due to his excessive narcissism.
mission_specialty_description: Incredible swordsmanship is one of the many talents he was born with.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Attack of the target for 2 turns.
Skill_2_description: Prepares for a duel by dispelling two debuffs, recovering Health by 15%, and granting an extra turn. When this skill is on cooldown, Evasion increases by 35%. After successfully evading, counterattacks with Graceful Cut and gains 1 Focus.
Skill_3_description: Pierces the enemy with a sword, and consumes all Focus. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of Focus consumed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Pierces the enemy with a sword, and consumes all Focus. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of Focus consumed. When 5 Focus is consumed, resets cooldown of Butterfly Cut.

name: Black Curse Powder
description: A catalyst used by a high-level mage, containing a powerful curse.
story: A warrior of the Emberstorm tribe who ascended to Great Chief at a young age. He leads Meldrec with a stubborn insistence not to rely on outside assistance, but due to conflict between tribes, invading Unknowns, and the disappearance of Malicus, his troubles are starting to pile up.
mission_specialty_description: Right or wrong, he has the will to see his decisions through to the end.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: 100% chance to burn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 1 turn each.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with a fiery explosion, making the target unhealable and decreasing Defense for 2 turns each.

name: Blaze Dingo
description: A weird cook of the Wild Dog Company who became normal
story: Originally far from what anyone would consider a normal Human, he is now a completely normal upstanding member of society. Every word out of his mouth is considerate and he has impeccable manners.
mission_specialty_description: The dignified do not show signs of panic.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_1_description: Attacks an enemy with a sharp dagger, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, healing the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a giant gauntlet, before healing the ally with the lowest Health. A critical hit activates Punishment against a random enemy. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Skill_3_description: Heals an ally and the caster with sacred power, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increasing Attack for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends the duration of Sacred Power granted to the caster by 1 turn and grants an extra turn.

name: Blazing Soul
description: It is said that the will of a Banshee Queen is often left behind as a tenacious soul.
story: A fiercely competitive but also horribly unlucky knight, she is very hot-headed and often gambles and loses everything. Her impulsive nature forced her parents to give all of the inheritance to her sister Carrot, who provides her an allowance to live off of.
mission_specialty_description: Even if there is no hope of victory, she refuses to give up and tries again.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_2_description: Shoots fire, resetting the cooldown of All-In! and granting an extra turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Shoots fire, granting the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns, resetting the cooldown of All-In!, and granting an extra turn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a blazing inferno, penetrating Defense by 50%.

name: Blazing Soul
description: It is said that the will of a Banshee Queen is often left behind as a tenacious soul.
story: A man of principle, Furious believes that a leader should serve the community, not individuals. He believes that the citylord is an important cog in the machine that is Aakhen.
mission_specialty_description: Unmoved by emotions, he makes his decisions with firm conviction.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_2_description: Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Raises morale of all allies, granting increased Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns, before granting an extra turn to the caster.

name: Blood Blade Karin
description: The wielder of a magical blade thirsty for blood
story: Karin is embroiled in an endless battle against the will of a cursed magical sword, compelled by its power to cause trouble. Though aggressive and cold-hearted while possessed by the sword, she sometimes escapes from the control of it and shows an unexpected side.
mission_specialty_description: The smell of blood travels far. She'll track the victim in no time.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Quickly strikes the enemy with a sword, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Caster's Combat Readiness increases by 50% when the enemy is defeated.
Skill_2_description: As Health decreases, Attack, Defense, and Speed increase.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 50% when an enemy is defeated.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies, sacrificing 20% of the caster's Health. Grants the caster an extra turn when an enemy is defeated.

name: Blood Moon Haste
description: An arrogant young man of noble blood
story: Sole heir of the strongest among all Vampires, he was separated from his father following an attack by a Human mob and found himself alone in a strange land. He deeply respects his father and misses him dearly.
mission_specialty_description: Having inherited the strongest power of all vampires, he does not hide his cruel nature in battle.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: Attacks by swinging a scythe, dispelling one buff.
Skill_1_soul_description: Ignores Effect Resistance.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Attacks by swinging a scythe, dispelling one buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_description: When an enemy is revived, grants all allies a barrier and immunity for 1 turn and resets the cooldown of Moon Slash. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a scythe, recovering Health of all allies. Penetrates Defense, but cannot trigger a critical hit. Damage dealt and amount recovered increase proportional to the caster's max Health. Decreases damage suffered by allies by 10% when this skill is available. When more than one damage reduction effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied.

name: Briar Witch Iseria
description: A witch of the thornbush who brings about calamity
story: Once one of the noblest knights in the kingdom, she was on a hunt to find the Dark Witch when she was cursed by the witch, causing her to turn her blade toward her lover and friends. The shock of her actions led her to lock herself in the witch's castle, surrounded by nothing but thornbushes and incapable of hurting anyone else.
mission_specialty_description: Whoever drives a blade through her heart will become the next witch.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.

name: Butcher Corps Inquisitor
description: Butcher Corps soldiers fighting for the Church of Ilryos
story: The main duty of the Church of Ilryos Butcher Corps is to track down and punish traitors or fugitives.
mission_specialty_description: Inquisitors know how to defeat their enemies easily with the knowledge they've acquired from Ilryos.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Strikes indiscriminately at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Strikes indiscriminately at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, and recovering Health proportional to the damage dealt.

name: Captain Rikoris
description: A trustworthy captain with his own unique spearmanship
story: Rikoris joined the Taranor Army on Schuri's advice and mastered his skills of spearmanship in a battle against the Chaos Sect. Now he spends his time trying to ease the unrest in Taranor while becoming the greatest spearman ever.
mission_specialty_description: In order to become the best spearman, he continues to practice every day.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_description: Encourages all allies, increasing Speed for 2 turns.
Skill_2_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Encourages all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

name: Carmainerose
description: A half-burned, blood-red, depressed Banshee
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. Reminiscent of the shriveled rose petals the day after a festival, Carmainerose dazzles her opponents by singing a song of her failed revenge.
mission_specialty_description: Her thirst for blood and victory knows no bounds. She'll do anything for it.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage as Health.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy, dispelling all buffs, and increasing Attack and Defense of the caster for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Carrot
description: A sassy magic researcher who sees all magic as math
story: A member of the Magic Research Department, Carrot sometimes helps the Student Council with their accounting at the request of Ginger and Hazel due to her talent with numbers. She is usually rational, except for her habit of wearing decorative ears to ward off jinxes.
mission_specialty_description: Cooking and battling require precise calculations and perfect planning.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases detonation chance to 100%.
Skill_2_description: After being attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Cartuja
description: Courageous and valiant, the greatest warrior in Farche
story: In Farche, the nomadic Tuharta Clan is wiped out by a great sandstorm. Cartuja leads the few survivors as they wander in search of a new home, working day and night as a mercenary to raise enough money to save his clan.
mission_specialty_description: Their curiosity for the new world is second to none.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.

name: Cecilia
description: Tough and beautiful\nQueen of Wintenberg
story: A brave woman known as the Storm Dragon Knight. Cecilia is Queen of Wintenberg and has a strong sense of responsibility. She has a righteous and sincere personality, but will stubbornly resist any attempts to change her mind.
mission_specialty_description: Having long fought dragons, the Wintenberg dynasty passes down their knowledge via holy scripture.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Celeste
description: A calm and collected mercenary who loves forests and silence
story: Currently working as a private mercenary, Celeste used to be a member of Aramintha's Silver Blade Company long ago. She says little and has an earnest and very serious personality, but suffers from thinking too much and an inability to choose.
mission_specialty_description: When looking for clues, she's as calm and precise as when she's drawing a bow.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_2_description: Shoots a volley of arrows at all enemies, with a 50% chance to decrease Combat Readiness by 20%. Does not increase cooldown count when the caster's Health is 80% or more.
Skill_3_description: Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted an extra turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Caster recovers 30% Health and is granted an extra turn and increased Attack for 2 turns.

name: Celestial Mercedes
description: Otherworldly creature, hiding her truth
story: A mysterious being from the stars, nobody knows where Celestial Mercedes came from, or what she has gone through. She freely duplicates any Human or thing she pleases, and currently resides in the Farche Frontier in a cloned body of Mercedes.
mission_specialty_description: There's a fine line between good and evil.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's max Health.
Skill_2_soul_description: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of the Last Spellbook. Increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies by releasing spells of The Last Spellbook. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and increases Combat Readiness by 20% according to the number of critical hits made.

name: Celine
description: A wandering swordswoman relying only on her sword
story: A swordswoman traveling the world to spread justice, and also the aunt and role model of Karin Fantaria. Her exploits are still legendary within Reingar, where she was once a member of the Public Security Club for some time before she left to wander the world.
mission_specialty_description: Her only fault is her poor memory.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a sheath. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Attacks a random enemy with Blink when an enemy uses a non-attack skill. Can be activated once every 2 turns.\nBlink	:	 Cuts the enemy in the blink of an eye. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored.
Skill_3_description: Dispels all debuffs from the caster and repeatedly slashes at the enemy, before triggering an explosion. Increases Evasion of the caster for 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Dispels all debuffs from the caster and repeatedly slashes at the enemy, before triggering an explosion. Increases Evasion of the caster for 2 turns. Recovers Health proportional to damage dealt.

name: Cerise
description: The young administrator of Aakhen who dreams of a better future
story: A young politician and administrator of Aakhen. She opposes her conservative father, Furious, who governs with zero-tolerance policies, and tries to solve problems with reasonable solutions as she strives to reconcile Aakhen and Perland.
mission_specialty_description: With concise reporting, analysis, and fast execution, she maximizes efficiency.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Explodes a magical sphere, stunning for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

name: Challenger Dominiel
description: The confident successor of Nixied
story: Fiercely proud and unreserved, Challenger Dominiel has little morality or sense of empathy. While constantly causing trouble, she refuses to admit her faults.
mission_specialty_description: Dreams about her voice ringing out across continents.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with electricity. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: When an ally makes a critical hit, the caster's next attack deals stacked additional damage proportional to the number of critical hits.
Skill_2_awakened_description: When an ally makes a critical hit, the caster's next attack deals stacked additional damage proportional to the number of critical hits and their Combat Readiness increases by 10% per critical hit.

name: Champion Zerato
description: An arrogant and impudent supremacist who only cares about strength
story: Incredibly skilled in fighting, Champion Zerato boasts a flawless win streak, largely thanks to his refusal to fight anyone he may be at risk of losing to. Frost Mage Zerato has been trying to pick a fight with him for a long time, but Champion Zerato keeps making excuses to avoid it.
mission_specialty_description: He does not want to break his winning streak.
Skill_1_description: Attacks two enemies including the target with an earthen blast, transferring two debuffs from the caster to the enemy and recovering the caster's Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Chaos Inquisitor
description: A fanatic enlightened to the grace of Chaos
story: Following an argument with the Chaos Sect Axe, he left the Chaos Sect only to be captured soon after by the Rose Apostles. During a narrow escape, he became filled with a desperate fear of death and was awakened to the existence of Chaos.
mission_specialty_description: His faith in Chaos is resolute.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy in the name of Chaos, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.

name: Chaos Sect Axe
description: An axeman who accepted the call of Chaos and founded the Chaos Sect.
story: Following the end of the Archdemon War, the Church of Ilryos Axe suffered a difficult period of desolation, until the God of Chaos spoke to him. Inspired to found the Chaos Sect, he has found a new purpose to subdue the world under the blade of his axe.
mission_specialty_description: To end their suffering, they chose a doctrine of heresy.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with an axe. A critical hit will inflict bleeding for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, granting an extra turn to the caster when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

name: Charles
description: The highly respected Knight Commander of the Order of the Sword
story: Although he may be rigid and loyal, he cannot help but act like an overprotective servant to Aither, and will deal with all kinds of things in order to protect him.
mission_specialty_description: He is represented by a strong will and devotion to Ezera.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, increases Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Additionally increases Defense of the caster for 2 turns. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.

name: Charlotte
description: Duchess of La Mare, an elegant and domineering Lady of the Swamp
story: Owner of La Mare, a castle in the Solayu Dark Swamp, Charlotte is known as the Lady of the Swamp. Fiercely competitive, she has a love-hate relationship with Cecilia. Full of pride, she despises anyone who points out her insecurities.
mission_specialty_description: From the swamp to the throne.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_3_description: Cuts all enemies while spinning, making them unhealable for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Acquires 100 Fighting Spirit after using this skill.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Cuts all enemies while spinning, making them unhealable for 2 turns. A successful attack always results in a critical hit.

name: Chloe
description: A cheerful, violent, wandering doll
story: A doll who is very simple and cheerful. Uninterested in trivial details, she almost forgot the fact she herself is a doll. Since she wanders around doing as she pleases, life has become a little complicated.
mission_specialty_description: Would do anything to overcome her fears. Good and evil, beauty and ugliness. None of this matters to her.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Hammers the enemy. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is inflicted with magic nail.
Skill_2_description: Inflicts magic nail for 3 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Inflicts magic nail for 3 turns. This effect cannot be resisted.
Skill_3_description: Soars into the air and attacks the enemy, stunning for 1 turn. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is inflicted with magic nail.

name: Church of Ilryos Axe
description: An axeman following the Church of Ilryos
story: A fanatical soldier who believes in the Church of Ilryos, fighting against those who seek to oppress it, and punishing traitors.
mission_specialty_description: To end their suffering, they chose a doctrine of heresy.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with an axe. A critical hit will inflict bleeding for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a shockwave, granting an extra turn to the caster when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

name: Cidd
description: The Wild Dog Company mascot, a wild hound as fast as the wind
story: Cidd is the youngest member and mascot of the Wild Dog Company, a group of mercenaries headquartered in an old ruined fortress in Wetheric Moor. Contrary to his cheerful and carefree appearance, he will competently complete any task assigned to him. He cares for the Wild Dog Company as if they were family.
mission_specialty_description: Outstanding senses of smell and hearing are very helpful when hunting.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a dagger. A critical hit will increase Speed of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_2_description: When the caster is granted increased Speed, Relentless Strike is enhanced to deal more damage and decreases Defense of the enemy for 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Cuts with a dagger, granting an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Cuts with a dagger, granting an extra turn when the enemy is defeated. Attacks using an advantageous element when the caster is granted increased Speed. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

name: Clarissa
description: A nun with a violent split personality
story: A young nun of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Clarissa's purity made her a mascot of the church. However, as soon as she set out on her pilgrimage, her true fighting nature began to reveal itself.
mission_specialty_description: When she's pursuing criminals, she doesn't even sleep.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_description: Becomes enraged for 3 turns when an enemy is killed by Harsh Lesson or Hysteric, and grants an extra AoE attack on all enemies.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies by spinning. Damage is increased when caster is enraged.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies by spinning, inflicting two bleeding effects for 2 turns, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. When the caster is enraged, damage dealt is increased.

name: Coli
description: A cheerful vigilante burdened with the horrors of war
story: Born in a village, Coli was made a refugee by the Archdemon War. She joined a band of vigilantes in order to help protect her family and has a talent for stealing items from thieves when she attacks them.
mission_specialty_description: Has always dreamed of using her savings to build a new village for everyone.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Ambushes the enemy, activating Ambush again when stealthed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_2_description: Attacks with an unseen blade, decreasing Combat Readiness by 30%, before granting a barrier and stealth for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to caster's Attack, and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a dagger and bomb, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% three times and granting the caster stealth for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with a dagger and bomb, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% three times, stunning the target for 1 turn and granting the caster stealth for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

name: Commander Lorina
description: Vice-Commander of The Order of the Shield with outstanding talent
story: Lorina became an official knight after defeating a Wyvern with her spear. She aims to lead the vanguard of the Order of the Shield one day, and acts without thinking based on what she believes is right.
mission_specialty_description: Through faith she can overcome moments of weakness and doubt.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear.

name: Corvus
description: A wild-blooded missionary, a veteran of bottomless faith
story: A priest of the Rose Apostles, Corvus is famous in Farche for leading the Young Sheep of the Eternal Mother missionaries.
mission_specialty_description: Helps wanderers with sincerity and passion.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_3_description: The caster becomes infuriated with Fighting Spirit for 3 turns, granting an extra turn.\nBegins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.\nGains 10 Fighting Spirit when attacked.
Skill_3_awakened_description: The caster becomes infuriated with Fighting Spirit for 3 turns, recovering Health, before granting an extra turn.\nBegins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit.\nGains 10 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

name: Crescent Moon Rin
description: A dancing girl beloved by everyone for her mysterious charm
story: A dancer at the Crescent Moon Theatre in Savara loved by many for her outstanding beauty, talent, and the mystery that surrounds her true identity. Only a few, including her guardian, Basar, know she is Rin.
mission_specialty_description: Once you fall for those eyes, there's no escaping.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a ring, granting a random buff to the caster for 1 turn.
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants a random buff to all allies for 2 turns.
Skill_2_description: Attacks the enemy with a lavish dance, stunning for 1 turn before stealing two buffs and granting their effects to all allies. When the target has no buffs, decreases cooldown of this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Crosses rings to attack the enemy, dispelling all of the target's buffs before granting immunity to all allies for 2 turns. Caster is granted an extra turn when buffs have been dispelled.

name: Crimson Armin
description: The bright and bubbly self-proclaimed Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame
story: A destructive super cute mercenary, the nickname of Super Cute Guardian of the Red Flame fits Armin perfectly. She assures that she will defend fiercely, indifferent of what she destroys while doing so.
mission_specialty_description: Being cute always wins, right?
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Covers all allies with an aura of holy spirit, granting immunity for 2 turns and invincibility for 1 turn.

name: Crozet
description: Honest and incorruptible, the Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield
story: Knight Commander of the Order of the Shield, Crozet places a strict emphasis on following the rules, and is notoriously inflexible on them. His excessive uprightness means he often does not realize when others are playing tricks on him.
mission_specialty_description: You might need a specialty or two to lead the Order of the Shield.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Grants a barrier and increased Defense to an ally for 2 turns when the ally's Health is 50% or less after being attacked. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once every 2 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Grants a barrier and increased Defense to an ally for 2 turns when the ally's Health is 50% or less after being attacked. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health. Can be activated once per turn.

name: Dark Corvus
description: A tired destroyer who despises the world
story: Corvus was originally a soldier from Rose Apostles until something caused him to lose his faith and grow disillusioned with the world, and now he only wishes for its destruction. However, he still contains a gentle side within him.
mission_specialty_description: Enemies cower when they see him destroy fortress walls.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a lethal hit. Damage dealt is only affected by the caster's Health and does not trigger critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with a lethal hit, recovering Health proportional to damage dealt. Damage dealt is only affected by the caster's Health and does not trigger critical hit. Begins the battle with a full skill cooldown count.

name: Demon Blood Gem
description: A gem made of the black blood of the Archdemon.
story: The Holy Order of the Blue Cross requested that Reingar find a way to calm Clarissa down. Instead, the researchers focused on how cats can still be loved after wreaking havoc. Then they turned her into a cat to eliminate everyone's complaints about her violence.
mission_specialty_description: She's very violent, but she's too adorable to be hated.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a morning star. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. When the caster is granted loveliness, triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Skill_3_description: Wiggles tail cutely, decreasing debuff duration on all allies by 2 turns, and granting the caster immunity and loveliness for 3 turns. Grants the caster an extra turn.

name: Demon Blood Gem
description: A gem made of the black blood of the Archdemon.
story: \You could be the queen of our store!\" -- Enticed by such a suggestion, Chloe began working in a maid caf, but with no idea what kind of work a maid is expected to do, she lacks a certain care for her customers."
mission_specialty_description: She breaks anything she touches, but she doesn't care.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants an extra turn.
Skill_2_description: Recovers the Health of the caster and the ally with the lowest Health at the beginning of the caster's turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health, and granting revive for 3 turns to all living allies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Entertains all allies with VIP Treatment, reviving all dead allies to 20% Health, and granting revive for 3 turns to all living allies. Increases Attack of all allies for 3 turns.

name: Desert Jewel Basar
description: The most brilliant gem in the history of Ki Ruburan
story: Prodigal son and heir of a once-famous merchant guild in Ki Ruburan, he changed greatly after going on an adventure with two of his friends. Upon his return, he took over control of his family's guild, which had since fallen to betrayals and misfortunes, and brought its fortune to new heights under its new name	:	 the Basar Merchant Guild.
mission_specialty_description: He has an instinct for only making the decisions that will benefit him most.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Attacks all enemies. Increases the amount recovered by Everlasting Oasis.
Skill_2_description: Heals all allies after using Desert Wind. Amount recovered increases proportional to the targets' max Health and the caster's Attack.

name: Destina
description: Beast of the Western Light, a Spirit Lord of Light and Autumn
story: Nicknamed \the Beast of the Western Light,\" Destina is a master of light and metal who has physically manifested in the image of her deeply beloved Soul Weaver, Ruele."
mission_specialty_description: Destina, the Spirit Lord of Light, keeps many memories. The warmth of light, the coldness of loss.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a staff and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Healing increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Attacks the enemy and greatly heals all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Skill_2_description: Blesses an ally, recovering their Health and increasing their Combat Readiness by 50%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs and recovering Health. When ally is debuffed, their Combat Readiness will also be increased by 15%. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Grants all allies the blessing of a Spirit Lord, dispelling all debuffs and recovering Health. When ally is debuffed, their Combat Readiness will also be increased by 15% per each debuff. Effect can only be applied up to 4 times. Healing increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Dingo
description: The master chef obsessed with ingredients over all else
story: A genius holding the power of inferno in his hands after swearing a compact with Malicus, the Lord of Fire, Dingo became a chef to make full use of his abilities. He sees all living creatures as potential ingredients.
mission_specialty_description: Dingo's dishes are so good they'll make you hallucinate. A real chef's chef.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants an extra turn.
Skill_3_description: Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing cooldown by 1 turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Provides all allies with a meal, dispelling all debuffs and increasing Critical Hit Chance for 2 turns before decreasing cooldown by 1 turn. Grants the caster an extra turn. Every time an enemy dies, the cooldown for this skill decreases by 1 turn.

name: Dizzy
description: A pure-hearted half-Gear confronting fate
story: A half-Gear who was born to a Human and a Gear. After being attacked by Humans, she held a deep distrust towards them, but after meeting various people she resolved those feelings. She loves humanity and nature and hates to fight, but will do so when necessary, making use of her wings, Necro and Undine.
mission_specialty_description: Because she loves nature and Humans so much, hurting them is the last thing she would ever do.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_1_name: I Used This to Catch Fish
Skill_1_description: Attacks all enemies with the power of magic, with a 25% chance each to stun for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases on debuffed enemies.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ray, extending the duration of debuffs by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ray, extending the duration of debuffs by 1 turn, except for those which prevent the enemy from moving, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 50%.
Skill_3_description: Unleashes a giant explosion to attack all enemies. The attack misses, but inflicts decreased Speed, Attack, and Hit Chance for 2 turns regardless.

name: Dominiel
description: Hard-working mage blessed by the Spirit Lord Nixied
story: Successor of a clan that has long served the Spirit Lord Nixied. After incredible effort she finally succeeded in harnessing Nixied's power, but still lacks confidence in her abilities.
mission_specialty_description: Born to a clan under the divine protection of Nixied, she is blessed by spirits.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Casts a barrier over all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases in proportion to the caster's Attack.
Skill_2_soul_description: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Casts reflect and a barrier on all allies for 2 turns with frost magic. Barrier strength increases in proportion to the caster's Attack.

name: Doris
description: A noble lady who embraces those wounded
story: Born to a noble Taranor family, Doris was forced to flee to Reingar after receiving a huge inheritance to escape her greedy stepmother. She wants to heal those wounded with her magic.
mission_specialty_description: The knowledge of past generations guides her.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_2_description: Recites the Celebration of Light, recovering the Health of all allies and granting continuous healing and increased Defense for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_2_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 15% with light magic. Amount recovered is proportional to the allys max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Recovers an ally's Health and increases their Combat Readiness by 30% with light magic. Amount recovered is proportional to the allys max Health.

name: Eaton
description: A lonely guard with fading memories
story: A mysterious Golem who stops people from entering certain areas, their muddled memories mean they don't know what they are protecting or why. Recently, they have begun to question whether they really ever were a Human, or if they are simply a Golem with the memories of a Human. Every time they encounter Humans they approach them out of pure curiosity, but often end up fighting due to a rumor that was spread in the past.
mission_specialty_description: They eventually come to find a meaningful answer after a while lost in meaningless thoughts.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_description: Strongly knees the enemy, with a 75% chance each to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Attacks all enemies.
Skill_3_description: Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Releases strong energy, dispelling all debuffs inflicted on the caster before granting a barrier and immunity for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Elena
description: High Priestess of Constella gazing up at the shining stars
story: From a young age, her parents taught her the doctrine of the stars. Despite her youth, she now leads the faithful of Constella with her unwavering devotion and strong connection to the Spirits.
mission_specialty_description: She cannot allow her faithful congregants to see any unpleasant sides of her.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with the power of the stars, dispelling one debuff each from two allies.
Skill_1_soul_description: Dispels all debuffs from all allies.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, granting invincibility to all allies for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a meteor shower, granting invincibility for 1 turn and increased Effect Resistance for 2 turns to all allies.

name: Elphelt
description: A pure, optimistic girl who wants to understand love
story: Elphelt is a warm-hearted girl who loves nature and animals, and the type of person who would never ignore someone who is lonely or in pain. Her optimistic personality makes her believe that nothing is impossible. She is a daydreamer who often gets lost in her imagination and loves a romantic tale.
mission_specialty_description: She believes that through love, she can befriend all creatures.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_2_description: Traps the enemy in a cake, before attacking them with a cake-cutting blade and increasing Critical Hit Chance of all allies for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, also decreases Defense of all remaining enemies for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

name: Elson
description: A kind and friendly Order of the Sword apprentice
story: A knight apprentice of the Order of the Sword, Elson. He is originally from Ezera, yet his parents left for Savara to set up a business of their own. He is kind and friendly but lacks confidence.
mission_specialty_description: He's always struggled to prove himself as a real knight.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with Meteor Shower of Light and recovers the Health of all allies. Healing increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Recovers Health and increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Recovers Health and increases Attack and Defense of all allies for 2 turns with strengthening magic. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

name: Enott
description: A sly and selfish priest of the Rose Apostles
story: A nasty, arrogant and ambitious man with an inflated sense of his own abilities, Enott used his connections with a noble Ezera family to become a priest of the Rose Apostles.
mission_specialty_description: A maker of medicine to heal wounds and food to stimulate thought.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Faithless Lidica
description: Striving for a new life while on the run
story: After being taken into a cult at a young age and enduring a childhood of suffering, Faithless Lidica finally managed to escape and is now on the run. Naturally, this experience has given her a skepticism towards religion and hatred of fanatics.
mission_specialty_description: She seeks to live her own life without relying on anyone.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy indiscriminately, increasing skill cooldown to max. A critical hit grants all allies skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

name: Falconer Kluri
description: A sharp-eyed mercenary, and friend of Fluri
story: Kluri started raising a falcon in hope of reducing her workload. Although it ended up doing the exact opposite, she's carried on raising it for fun. Perhaps it learned from its master, because it will never do anything too difficult unless Kluri orders it to.
mission_specialty_description: She can smell the woods even from the middle of a desert.
mission_attribute_description: null

name: Fallen Cecilia
description: A dark dragon bound by a desire for revenge and an endless grudge
story: Fallen Cecilia is chasing a mage who turned her family into dark magic stones, dreaming of the day she can get her revenge and join her loved ones again.
mission_specialty_description: Though a dark magic stone has caused part of her body to harden into stone and is destroying her mind, she refuses to put her weapon down.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at end of the turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Grants a barrier for 2 turns to all allies at the start of the battle, and grants a barrier for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the caster's turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies in an explosion ofspiteful emotions. Grants all allies skill nullifier, negating damage received from the next skill attack.Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Fighter Maya
description: A magic doll of Reingar created for battles
story: The second magic doll to be created in Reingar, modeled on Maya with incredible combat skills and a belligerent attitude. She is the type to learn and grow from her experiences, but having been created only a short time ago, she tends to be childish and overly honest about her feelings. She is fond of her sparring partner, Zerato.
mission_specialty_description: Bravely faces any hardship head-on.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a blunt weapon, with a 75% chance to provoke for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Defense.
Skill_1_soul_description: Provoke chance increases to 100%.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a powerful smash. Damage dealt increases by 300% when the enemys Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the casters Defense. Grants the caster an extra turn when the enemy is defeated.

name: Free Spirit Tieria
description: A beautiful and lonely adventurer chasing criminals
story: A bounty hunter chasing criminals across Orbis. She's as beautiful as a flower and loves to be complimented for her looks.
mission_specialty_description: She could talk about her travels for days and still not run out of interesting stories to tell.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with an axe, with a 50% chance to decrease Attack for 2 turns. A critical hit will increase damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Releases condensed energy at all enemies, recovering Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt. Cooldown of this skill decreases by 1 turn when an enemy is defeated.
Skill_3_description: Dashes towards the enemy and cuts them down with a powerful strike, decreasing Defense for 2 turns. A critical hit will grant immunity to the caster for 2 turns.

name: Fused Nerve
description: A special muscle accidentally created during an experiment of forced fusion.
story: Diene, Saint of Ezera, received the Goddess's divine revelation and fearlessly led the world to victory against the Archdemon, even without the Heir of the Covenant. Later, she became Ezera's queen.
mission_specialty_description: She overcomes hardship through her deeply pious faith.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: With the Blessings of the Goddess, covers all allies with a barrier for 2 turns before dispelling one debuff. Barrier strength increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_description: A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.
Skill_3_soul_description: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: A miracle of the Goddess manifests, increasing Attack and Critical Hit Resistance of all allies for 3 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

name: General Purrgis
description: A cool-headed general commanding the respect of all
story: Daring and responsible, General Purrgis will never abandon his subordinates in a dangerous situation, and commands all of their respect.
mission_specialty_description: Spends a lot of time hanging around the lobby thinking about his next task.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Gloomyrain
description: A Banshee like lonely rain falling on a foggy city
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. When the ruins are masked in fog, she sings songs of rumors. Looking like a small lantern flame flickering in the darkness, if you allow yourself to be tempted you will lose your life in a moment.
mission_specialty_description: Extreme fear can lead to disastrous results.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_2_description: Increases Speed and Attack when the caster is inflicted with a debuff, and grants immunity to stun, provoke, and sleep.

name: Guider Aither
description: A free and nimble little bird that has lost its memories
story: An ever-cheerful traveler, Aither loves life on the road. As he embarks on a journey to find his lost memories, he is often followed by small animals.
mission_specialty_description: Neither wind nor rain can stop him.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_2_description: Attacks with spirit power, and grants caster a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with spirit power, and heals all allies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Delivers a blow to the enemy with spirit power, and heals all allies before granting continuous healing for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the damage dealt.

name: Gunther
description: A carefree and tough warrior known as the Slaughterer
story: A veteran of the Archdemon War, Gunther is often misunderstood because of his rough-looking face, but he is a highly-talented treasure hunter.
mission_specialty_description: He's diligent and skillful. War doesn't take place just on the battlefield.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with an axe, stunning for 1 turn and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.

name: Haste
description: An aloof boy trained in assassination
story: Trained since he was young, Haste is the optimal assassin. Part of the Sicar assassin organization, he is fearless and hates losing. He has no interest in other people, but deep down he yearns for the same close relationships they hold.
mission_specialty_description: Without a sense of guilt you can carry out a mission by any means necessary.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_2_description: Attacks by spinning an enormous scythe and recovers the Health of all allies proportional to the damage dealt. Recovery increases by an additional 50% when the enemy is bleeding.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks by spinning an enormous scythe, making the enemy unhealable and inflicting vampiric touch for 2 turns. Recovers the Health of all allies proportional to the damage dealt, with recovery increasing by an additional 50% when the enemy is bleeding.

name: Hazel
description: The savvy model student clerk of the Student Council
story: Younger sister of Ginger, the vice president of the student council, Hazel is the self-styled \Black Sheep\" clerk of the student council. An inflexible, sharp-tongued slob, yet also an extensively knowledgeable model student. She has a detailed understanding of the personal relationships and weaknesses of everyone in Reingar."
mission_specialty_description: Brains beat brawn every time.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_2_description: Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health. When the ally's Health is 50% or less, the amount recovered will increase by 50%.
Skill_3_description: Uses strengthening magic to recover Health and increase Attack of all allies for 1 turn. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Uses strengthening magic to recover Health and increase Attack of all allies for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health.

name: Holiday Yufine
