description: A lively Dragon girl who is passionate about having fun and eating
story: For her vacation, Yufine's visiting a resort with a special goal in mind	:	 to try each and every dish she's never seen in Ezera!
mission_specialty_description: She immediately digests everything she devours.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Dispels two debuffs from all allies and attacks all enemies in the middle of a night market, before granting the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends the duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Dispels two debuffs from all allies and attacks all enemies in the middle of a night market, before granting the caster increased Attack (Greater) for 2 turns. Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 20%.

name: Horn of Desire
description: The strange power contained within this devil horn is said to drive people to insanity.
story: Daughter of a high-ranking noble, she was inflicted with an incurable disease and left in the care of the Church of the Goddess to receive treatment. However, as her condition only continued to worsen over time and her family eventually cut off support, she became little more than a burden. Cursing her own fate and the false hope the Church gave her, she traveled to a place named in a forbidden book and met with a mysterious being. She was then reborn anew, filled with hatred towards the world and the Church of the Goddess.
mission_specialty_description: The only thing she values is her own life.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases effect chance to 100% and decreases Attack of the target for 2 turns.
Skill_2_description: When the caster is immortal, enemies cannot be revived and all allies recover Health every time an enemy dies. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health. Recovery effect can only be activated once per turn.
Skill_3_description: Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Whips up a vortex of darkness and loathing, granting immortality to the caster for 2 turns. Grants increased Attack and Speed  to all allies except for the caster for 2 turns.

name: Hurado
description: Where am I from? A wandering mercenary who lost his memory
story: Hurado is a mercenary with no memories, wandering in search for his home. Unlike his intimidating appearance, he is extremely kind and sincere, and vulnerable to being conned by others.
mission_specialty_description: No matter where you are, just keep calm.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.

name: Iseria
description: The Knight of White Flowers, protector of a solemn oath
story: Second-in-Command of the Order of the Sword, Iseria is an Elf unable to return to her ancestral home of Dun Blyraia due to some reason. Known as the Knight of White Flowers, she has a calm and solemn personality.
mission_specialty_description: Elves are always curious about new worlds.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases effect chance by 50% and increases damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Skill_2_description: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Resets skill cooldown of an ally except for the caster with light energy. Grants an extra turn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a giant Magic Sword, dispelling all buffs, decreasing Defense, and making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns.

name: Jecht
description: A hard worker who dreams of becoming the world's strongest mercenary
story: A mercenary from the Itan Clan, Jecht is committed to self-discipline and hopes to improve the treatment of his fellow Suin by becoming a skilled and famous warrior.
mission_specialty_description: Uses his talents to improve how Suin are treated and portrayed.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing to all allies for 2 turns.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with wind magic, granting continuous healing and increased Speed to all allies for 2 turns.

name: Jena
description: A composed mage of the Rose Apostles
story: A calm and cautious mage of the Rose Apostles, Jena is rarely agitated by anything. She is childhood friends with fellow Rose Apostle, Lidica.
mission_specialty_description: With steady resolve you can solve anything.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a staff, dealing damage proportional to number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

name: Judge Kise
description: An observer of fate, the Heir who watches over the world
story: An Heir of the Sixth World, Kise is leader of the Nocturnes. She fought every battle against the Archdemon alongside the Guardian Kromcruz. Though she can be sluggish and sharp-tongued, she cares greatly for her fellow Heirs.
mission_specialty_description: Facing her fate, she carries out her duty.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe, with a 75% chance to dispel a buff from each enemy. Damage dealt increases with more enemies.

name: Judith
description: A Public Security Club officer, who on second glance is revealed as a thief
story: A cute and cheerful member of Reingar's Public Security Club, Judith originally came to Reingar as a thief with her eyes on magical artifacts. However, she enjoyed her time in the Public Security Club so much, she eventually forgot her original goal. She is an old friend of the Longtail Company's commander, Armin.
mission_specialty_description: She can go anywhere with her skills of subterfuge.

name: Karin
description: The righteous prosecutor of the Public Security Club
story: Second Lieutenant in the Public Security Club of Reingar, Karin struggles to maintain order in the Magical Academy, a place brimming with dangerous creativity. Many call her the conscience and the real big boss of the Public Security Club.
mission_specialty_description: As justice is the root of all order, she performs one heroic exploit after another.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_1_description: Strikes the enemy with a sword. A critical hit will decrease cooldown for 1 turn.
Skill_2_description: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Slashes the enemy. A critical hit will decrease Defense for 1 turn and grant an extra turn to the caster.
Skill_3_description: Cuts the enemy with lightning speed. Damage dealt increases with a critical hit.

name: Kawerik
description: A mage left with nothing after seeking his revenge
story: An abandoned child found by magical scholars of Witchaven, Kawerik enlisted in the Enhanced Magic Division and made important contributions in the Archdemon War that Diene took part in. However, the side effects of the experiment have left him suffering from paralysis that is slowly killing him and have turned him into a cold-blooded contract killer.
mission_specialty_description: Despite the cruel path fate has set out for him, the brilliance of his talent shines through.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Locks all enemies within subspace before triggering an explosion. Penetrates Defense by 30% when the caster is granted increased Speed. Damage dealt increases proportional to the casters Speed.

name: Kayron
description: The Shadow King who deals in grudges
story: An Acolyte, and commander of an army of undead known as the Dust Walkers. It is said that he demands your soul and loyalty in return for releasing you from your grudges.
mission_specialty_description: He destroys everything with his army of Dust Walkers, yearning for the annihilation of the world.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases damage dealt.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword. When the enemy is defeated, extends any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn. Deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy by exploding the Archdemon's Might contained within the sword, increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. When the enemy is defeated, extends any buffs granted to the caster by 1 turn. Deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.

name: Ken
description: I will become stronger! A lively fist-fighter
story: Born an orphan, Ken has faced many hardships in his life, but manages to maintain a bright and optimistic personality. He believes the only way to survive is through strength, and dedicates his life to training and always admires the strong.
mission_specialty_description: Exuding confidence, no one can defeat him in this battle.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a flurry of strikes, with a 35% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Burns for 2 turns when the caster is granted vigor. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_description: Kicks the enemy, increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to decrease Defense of the target for 2 turns. Gains 40 Fighting Spirit when an enemy is defeated. When the caster is granted vigor, chance of decreasing Defense becomes 100%, ignoring Effect Resistance. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, stunning for 1 turn, before granting vigor to the caster for 4 turns and gaining 15 Fighting Spirit. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Caster begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit, and gains 5 Fighting Spirit when attacked.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Delivers a powerful blow after a flurry of strikes, stunning for 1 turn and decreasing Attack for 2 turns, before granting vigor to the caster for 4 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health. Caster begins the first battle with 50 Fighting Spirit, and gains 5 Fighting Spirit when attacked.

name: Khawana
description: A curious and cheerful adventurer from Meldrec
story: Despite being the clever younger sister of the Great Chief, Khawana holds no political ambitions and is instead far more interested in spending quality time with friends and family, collecting interesting things, and experiencing new cultures.
mission_specialty_description: She solves many problems with her positive attitude and constant hard work.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a flame guardian, increasing Attack of all allies for 2 turns. When all allies are Fire elemental Heroes, grants all allies skill nullifier once.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy with a flame guardian, stunning for 1 turn before dispelling two buffs. Increases damage dealt when all allies are Fire elemental Heroes.

name: Kikirat v2
description: High-tech machinery\nmodeled after Gigantes
story: Machinery based on the Kikirat. It has cleaning functionality for comfort, but often mistakes Humans fortrash.

name: Kise
description: A mysterious woman who appears with the moonlight
story: Leader of the Nocturnes. Having been forced to part with her lover, she now has a tendency to obsess over anything she loves.
mission_specialty_description: Even time stops in front of her will.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a scythe. Damage dealt increases by 70% when the target is buffed.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a scythe. Penetrates Defense by 60% when caster is stealthed.
Skill_3_description: Leaps towards the enemy to attack, becoming stealthed for 2 turns. A critical hit will also grant a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Leaps towards the enemy to attack, increasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns and becoming stealthed for 2 turns. A critical hit will also grant a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, and barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's current Health.

name: Kizuna AI
description: Hello, everyone! An entertainer forever full of energy
story: Originally a virtual broadcaster from Earth, Kizuna AI fell into a deep sleep inside of a disc when the planet was destroyed, until one day she found herself in the hands of Yuna, who rebooted her. She hopes to continue learning more about Humans through her new broadcasts on Orbis.
mission_specialty_description: Thanks to her super high-tech capabilities, she is able to find the answers you seek in a fraction of a second.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks by firing a heart at the enemy, before dispelling a debuff from an ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Dispels a debuff from all allies.
Skill_2_description: Heals the ally with the lowest Health at the end of the turn. Amount recovered increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Cheers on allies, granting a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Cheers on allies, granting increased Attack and a barrier to all allies for 3 turns, before granting increased Speed to the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Kluri
description: A mercenary doing the bare minimum to earn her paycheck
story: A member of Armin's Longtail Company, Kluri's only goal is to earn money to live a decent life. She hates anything that's tedious. Having left Dun Blyraia at a young age, she is unaware she is an Elf.
mission_specialty_description: She can smell the woods even from the middle of a desert.
mission_attribute_description: null

name: Krau
description: A self-confident and forward-looking knight
story: One of the Knights of Taranor, Krau's outgoing and confident personality often causes people to misunderstand his intentions, but he tends to silently push ahead with what he thinks is right. He is risking everything he has to fight for the future of his homeland.
mission_specialty_description: A sword and a shield are all it takes.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Summons the Guardian Ziegfried to attack, dealing damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, penetrating Defense. Also grants a barrier to the caster for 2 turns, with strength proportional to the caster's max Health. This attack cannot trigger a critical hit.

name: Lena
description: An optimistic fighter who just stepped foot into the world
story: Daughter of a family of sorcerers from Witchaven, the wandering fighter Hataan taught her martial arts and of the outside world as he passed through the city. After he left she lost interest in magic and worked to hone her fighting skills alone. Unsatisfied, she eventually left Witchaven as well to find Hataan and become his disciple.
mission_specialty_description: She believes everything will work out well in the end.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a strong fist, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful storm, decreasing Combat Readiness by 20%, before increasing Attack of the caster for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy is defeated with this skill, cooldown does not occur.

name: Leo
description: A trouble making joker who dreams of becoming the ultimate warrior
story: Born to a family of scholars, Leo grew up learning much of warriors and myth. He is bravely traveling with his pet and good friend Racoo, in hope of realizing his dream of becoming a warrior himself.
mission_specialty_description: Sometimes an unbiased look can discover the truth.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Racoo flies into the enemies like a bullet and attacks all of them, decreasing Speed for 2 turns, with a 75% chance to stun.

name: Lidica
description: A hot-tempered member of the Phantom CIC, hunting Unknown
story: Expelled from the Rose Apostles, she joined the Phantom CIC to investigate the Land of Death. She wanted to defeat the Unknown and instill faith unto others. However, her rough personality still causes problems within the Phantom CIC.
mission_specialty_description: She was born to cause trouble all over the place.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a sword, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Attacks with a sword, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. When the enemy is debuffed, decreases Combat Readiness by an additional 10%.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy with a whip sword, decreasing buff durations by 1 turn, before decreasing Combat Readiness by 100% and decreasing Speed for 2 turns. Grants the caster skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack.

name: Lilias
description: Ambitious Citylord of Perland
story: Trained from birth to be citylord, Lilias is a descendant of the royal family of Perlutia, a kingdom that once ruled the entire continent of Cidonia. She is passionate about becoming the best leader possible for Perland and supports harmony with other cities, but behind all of that lies a deeper ambition.
mission_specialty_description: She will do whatever it takes to get what she wants.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_1_description: Takes the lead and attacks, triggering a Dual Attack from a random ally. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Commands the Perland Army to fire on all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Dispels all debuffs from all allies and commands the Perland Army to fire on all enemies, decreasing Combat Readiness by 25% and inflicting damage according to the Attack of the Hero with the highest Attack. Increases the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.

name: Lilibet
description: Mercenary of Rekos who wanted to be a tailor
story: Originally born into a tailor family on the planet Rekos, she was raised by mercenaries after losing her parents in a civil war, and became a wandering swordswoman. Until she met Straze, the Black Knight, and her life changed forever.
mission_specialty_description: She cuts everything in any shape she wants.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_3_description: Slashes the enemy with Cho & Mal, inflicting extinction when the enemy is defeated. Grants the caster skill nullifier once, negating damage received from the next skill attack. Hit Chance is increased by 20% when using this skill.

name: Little Queen Charlotte
description: An elegant young queen who showed up to protect her land
story: A young queen who is strong and full of kindness. She leads her people with a mature, wise demeanor. The people of Solayu previously had complaints about the Lady of La Mare, but their feelings are slowly being changed by their lady's changed behavior.
mission_specialty_description: She knows her duties as queen better than anyone and leads the public accordingly.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a giant sword before granting the caster immunity for 1 turn.
Skill_2_ehnhance_1_description: + 0.5% damage reduction for allies except for the caster
Skill_2_ehnhance_2_description: + 0.5% damage reduction for allies except for the caster
Skill_2_ehnhance_3_description: + 1% damage reduction for allies except for the caster
Skill_2_ehnhance_4_description: + 1% damage reduction for allies except for the caster
Skill_2_ehnhance_5_description: + 2% damage reduction for allies except for the caster
Skill_3_description: Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks. Penetrates Defense by 50%. Deals increased damage against Dark elemental enemies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Smashes the enemy with a sword and attacks. Penetrates Defense by 50%. Deals increased damage against Dark elemental enemies. Recovers Health of the caster proportional to damage dealt.

name: Lorina
description: She may look skilled, but she's useless! An Order of the Shield apprentice
story: An apprentice of the Order of the Shield, Lorina is constantly practicing to achieve her goal of becoming a knight. She thinks she's clever and confident, but in reality she's quite naive and easily tricked by others.
mission_specialty_description: Through faith she can overcome moments of weakness and doubt.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Knocks the enemy into the air with a spear, increasing caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.
Skill_3_description: Jumps into the air and strikes down at the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

name: Lots
description: A valiant healer searching for a rare magical item
story: Originally a part of the Order of the Blue Cross, Lots was dispatched to Reingar, where he studied healing magic. Wanting to test his abilities and find a rare magical item, he has left on a journey.
mission_specialty_description: Those who are used to darkness don't lose their senses even in the midst of chaos.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 2 turns.

name: Ludwig
description: The sole survivor of the Nocturnes
story: Ludwig is the sole survivor of the Nocturnes, the family responsible for protecting the Lunar Cemetery. He cherishes the Guardian Kromcruz more than anyone else. Though he might look young, he is well along in years.
mission_specialty_description: Knowledge of the Nocturnes and immortal life has granted him mysterious and broad knowledge.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with Nocturne magic, penetrating Defense by 20%. When the caster is invincible, penetrates Defense by an additional 10%. A critical hit will grant the caster a barrier for 2 turns, with strength increasing proportional to the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with Nocturne magic, penetrating Defense by 20%. When the caster is invincible, penetrates Defense by an additional 30%. A critical hit will grant the caster a barrier for 2 turns, with strength increasing proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Luluca
description: A shaman of Rekos who crossed the universe for revenge
story: An Alien girl who traveled across the universe seeking revenge against Straze for bringing ruin to her world. She's determined to make Straze pay for what he has done to her friends and restore her homeworld.
mission_specialty_description: She can see the true nature of everything. Truth or lie, it doesn't matter to her.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with intense elemental force, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_description: With the blessing of the stars, grants increased Defense and barrier to all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.
Skill_2_soul_description: All skill cooldowns decreased by 2 turns.

name: Luna
description: Half-Dragon of Wintenberg seeking vengeance
story: Luna is a half-Dragon, half-Human knight that has been loyal to Wintenberg since the time of Queen Francesca. Only a few know of the true feelings hidden behind her smile.
mission_specialty_description: She watches over the endless wars looking for a chance to destroy Wintenberg.
Skill_1_description: Stabs the target a random number of times. Skill cooldown decreases by 1-3 turns and damage dealt increases according to the number of attacks.

name: Martial Artist Ken
description: A boy heading for greatness
story: In his goal of becoming the strongest in the universe, he is hunting down and challenging every martial arts master he can find. He will cross time and space, and even dimensions, to find a worthy challenger.
mission_specialty_description: His desire to fight the strongest made him follow the path of Asura.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Has a 30% chance to counterattack when attacked, with a 100% chance to counterattack with Dragon Flame after suffering a critical hit.\nDragon Flame	:	 Causes critical hit, and deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health.

name: Mascot Hazel
description: A pretty girl with stunning beauty
story: Hazel disguised herself to recruit more members for the student council. Only a few know her true identity, and once she's finished with her business, she returns to her original appearance.
mission_specialty_description: Brains beat brawn every time.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_2_description: Heals the target proportional to the caster's Attack and the target's max Health. When the ally's Health is 50% or less, the amount recovered will increase by 50%.
Skill_3_description: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all other allies for 1 turn, before recovering Health of all allies. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Encourages allies by increasing Attack of the target and all allies for 2 turns, before recovering Health of all allies. When the target is a Fire elemental Hero, grants the target increased Attack (Greater) instead. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health and the caster's Attack.

name: Maya
description: A young knight with a strong arm and shield
story: An apprentice knight of the Order of the Shield, Maya boasts incredible arm strength. Finding great value in her work protecting people, she devoted herself to the Order of the Shield. She cares greatly for her family back home.
mission_specialty_description: Uses their buff arms to fight against injustice.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Melissa
description: A Vampire betrayed by her lover, crossing the ocean to take her revenge
story: A Vampire who dreams of revenge after losing everything. Originally the eldest daughter of a noble family, she fell in love with a Vampire she met at a ball and soon became a Vampire herself. After a long separation following an ambush, she was enraged to discover her love had betrayed her. Though he had since died, that won't stop her exacting her revenge on his son.
mission_specialty_description: She will do anything for revenge, no matter how difficult or brutal.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Attacks by unleashing their inner rage, granting immortality to the caster for 1 turn. Skill cooldown is reset when the enemy is defeated.
Skill_3_description: Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, cursing 2 turns. This skill is unaffected by elemental disadvantage. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Dispels all buffs from the enemy before attacking by releasing their pent-up aggression, cursing for 2 turns, with a critical hit granting the caster an extra turn. This skill is unaffected by elemental disadvantage. Elite or Boss monsters cannot be cursed.

name: Mercedes
description: A blank-faced Homunculus chosen by The Last Spellbook
story: A Homunculus placed in the care of Queen Diene some years previously, Mercedes has a poker face that gives away little emotion, but she grows quickly attached to those who show her kindness. Sometimes, she may awkwardly mimic others or repeat what they say.
mission_specialty_description: The Eye of Kal's knowledge came from the Goddess Diche.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_description: Attacks two enemies with shock magic.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a massive light sphere. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases as enemies become fewer.
Skill_3_description: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to attack all enemies. The lower the enemy's Health, the greater damage dealt.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Releases the power of the Ancient Book to strongly attack all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.

name: Mercenary's Medicine
description: There is a rumor that mercenaries use this medicine to gain temporary strength.
story: Granddaughter of a reclusive magical scholar, Vivian is gifted with incredible magical ability. As leader of Witchaven, she maintains a delicate balance between bickering factions of sorcerers, but the growing numbers of Unknown and machinations of political enemies have her treading on thin ice.
mission_specialty_description: Beyond the cold eyes and indifferent exterior lies a warm heart.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with a thunderstorm. Activates Thunder God's Cry again when an enemy is defeated. Each subsequent Thunder God's Cry activated this way deals decreased damage, and can be activated up to 3 times.
Skill_3_description: Fully amplifies mana, granting immunity to all allies for 3 turns before granting increased Attack (Greater) to the caster for 3 turns while increasing Attack of all allies except for the caster for 3 turns.

name: Mirsa
description: A cool treasure hunter shining within a sandstorm
story: A mercenary and adventurer constantly going back and forth between Savara and the Great Desert, Mirsa's main business is treasure hunting. A child of nomads, she has no fixed home. Finding old ruins in the desert is one of her favorite things.
mission_specialty_description: She kills her targets quickly and silently.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_3_description: Ambushes the target, silencing them for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Ambushes the target, silencing them for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to caster's Speed.

name: Mistychain
description: A cold-blooded Banshee with an ice-cold scream
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings songs of a passion frozen by painful betrayal. She is known to mercilessly tear things apart with her bare hands.
mission_specialty_description: Finally, a recipe for beauty has been developed! I'm afraid to taste it, though.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Claws the enemy, absorbing some of the damage to heal all allies.
Skill_3_description: Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks by absorbing the enemy's life force. Some of the damage dealt is absorbed to heal all allies. When the enemy is defeated, grants revive for 2 turns to the ally with the lowest Health.

name: Montmorancy
description: A naive and hardworking apprentice nun
story: An apprentice sister of the Holy Order of the Blue Cross, Montmorancy is an understudy of Achates and Clarissa, the latter of which she likes very much. She is naive and often makes mistakes, but overcomes them with a positive attitude.
mission_specialty_description: Sometimes you just need something delicious.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_2_description: Dispels one debuff from all allies, and heals debuffed allies. Amount recovered is proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Effect is granted to all allies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Recovers ally's Health and grants immunity for 2 turns, while increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Amount recovered is proportional to the target's max Health.

name: Mucacha
description: A reformed thief, descended from Angara
story: Living carefree as the leader of a group of thieves, Mucacha turned over a new leaf after meeting Cecilia and began an honest life as a follower of Corvus. He cherishes loyalty.
mission_specialty_description: Come at me! As you know, experience always makes you stronger.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.

name: Mui
description: A monster tamer dreaming of her very own paradise
story: A former circus trainer talented at taming ferocious monsters. Unsatisfied with the small world of the circus and believing in her ability to tame anything, she quit and now dreams of a comfortable life as an object of worship.
mission_specialty_description: All creatures, no matter how fierce, bow their heads to her and submit to her training.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases effect chance to 100% and inflicts a random debuff for 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Drives monsters forward to attack all enemies, dispelling two buffs.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Drives monsters forward to attack all enemies, dispelling two buffs. Grants increased Attack to all allies for 3 turns.

name: Nemunas
description: An archer of the Winka family longing to become a Dragon Knight
story: Her nickname is Nemu. As a child, Nemunas was saved from the Dragon Valley by the Queen of Wintenberg and her Dragon Knights. At this point, she decided she must become a Dragon Knight. She left her home to participate in the Wintenberg Tournament to become a Dragon Knight.
mission_specialty_description: She can see farther and more accurately than anyone else.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_2_description: Powerfully shoots an arrow at the enemy, decreasing Hit Chance for 2 turns and Combat Readiness by 30%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Encourages allies, dispelling one debuff.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Encourages allies, dispelling one debuff. Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns.

name: Otillie
description: An escaped Homunculus and bold-faced liar
story: Having escaped the Homunculus experiments in the Laboratory, Otillie went to Wetheric Moor, following her cloudy memory of the past. Her blank facial expression and lack of Human emotion makes it very hard to tell if she is lying. She is quick-witted with good conversational skills.
mission_specialty_description: She is unrelenting in her advance; she does not know fear.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Pavel
description: A patroller carrying the fate of Cidonia on his shoulders
story: A young member of the Perland Raiders. As the son of pathfinders through ancient ruins, Pavel inherited an exceptional talent for tracking and navigation. He is incredibly loyal to Perland, the largest city in Cidonia, for providing his previously nomadic family with safety, and is frequently trusted with important missions for the Raiders.
mission_specialty_description: He is unmatched when it comes to tracking and navigation.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Fires a strong blast of wind at all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Grants the caster increased Attack for 2 turns, before firing a strong blast of wind at all enemies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. This skill cannot trigger a counterattack.
Skill_3_description: Swiftly cuts and shoots the enemy. When the enemy is not an Elite or Boss monster, damage sharing effects are ignored. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

name: Pearlhorizon
description: A quiet Banshee who strangles her enemies slowly
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sing songs of malice that flow slowly like dust. She is known to strangle opponent with a gentle and friendly face.
mission_specialty_description: This doll we found recently is in great condition. It almost seems as if it was alive.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is sleeping, extra damage is dealt equivalent to 10% of max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy and stuns them for 1 turn. When the enemy is sleeping, extra damage is dealt equivalent to 20% of max Health.

name: Purrgis
description: A sly mercenary dreaming of a jackpot
story: Believing life is all about hitting a jackpot, Purrgis loves to snoop around. Born in Farche, a poor region, he has suffered discrimination for many years, turning him into an opportunist obsessed with money.
mission_specialty_description: Exaggerates frequently when bragging about his power.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 70% chance to stun for 1 turn when the target's Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with a powerful ground pound, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn. Has a 100% chance to stun for 1 turn when the target's Health is 30% or less. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Pyllis
description: A lonely Homunculus with missing memories
story: Part of the Church of Ilryos, Pyllis was originally Human before the Homunculus experiments changed her. She cannot remember anything from her time as a Human, but has a lingering feeling of being abandoned by a friend.
mission_specialty_description: Unrepentant and without regret, she follows orders and thinks of herself as a machine.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_2_description: Increases Defense when attacked. Increases Defense of all allies for 2 turns every fourth attack received. Effect can only stack up to 5 times.
Skill_3_description: Attacks the enemy, and grants barrier on the caster for 2 turns. Barrier strength is proportional to the caster's Defense.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy, and grants barrier on all allies for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases in proportion to the caster's Defense.

name: Ras
description: Heir of the Covenant, a defender of the world
story: Created to protect the world and all life within it, he is admired as the leader of the Heirs and the alter ego of the Goddess. He has a good personality and is very understanding, though he lacks some understanding of Humans.
mission_specialty_description: The Heir of the Covenant bears the weight of the world upon his shoulders.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a sword, dealing damage proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_awakened_description: Attacks with a sword, with 75% chance to dispel a buff. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_2_description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, before triggering a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Strongly attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, before recovering the caster's Health and increasing Defense of the caster for 2 turns. Amount recovered and damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Ravi
description: The aggressive little girl reborn as a Wraith
story: Ravi once was a quiet girl living in a countryside, until she fell into a victim of the Homunculus experiments and became a Wraith. Since Ravi was made by the power of Tenebria, she strongly believes she is the chosen one.
mission_specialty_description: She vanquishes all enemies according to Acolyte Tenebria's will.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a double-edged axe before absorbing some of the damage dealt as Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Greatly increases amount of damage dealt. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Skill_3_description: Brutally attacks all enemies, with a 75% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Brutally attacks all enemies, with a 75% chance to stun for 1 turn, decreasing Combat Readiness of stunned enemies by 100%.

name: Ray
description: An Aakhen military doctor who dreams of reformation
story: A young nobleman who joined the army after an argument with his father, who believes that medical treatment should only be provided to nobles who can pay. Ray dreams of a world in which those who are less fortunate can receive the medical treatment they need.
mission_specialty_description: He is always surrounded by a refreshing air that alleviates pain and illness.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: Attacks by throwing a bottle, dispelling one debuff from an ally.
Skill_2_description: Radiates light upon all allies, granting a barrier for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Radiates light upon all allies, recovering Health and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Invigorates the team by dispelling all debuffs inflicted on all allies, and grants immunity for 2 turns before recovering Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.

name: Remnant Violet
description: A cold-blooded military man forging a new order
story: Remnant Violet succeeded in reviving the fortunes of his family after becoming its head, but developed a deep disillusionment with the nobles and citizenry of Perland through years of war. Eventually, he helped Lilias become queen and led the purge of her opponents. He later became the loyal captain of her Queen's Guard and is now the second most powerful person in Perland.
mission_specialty_description: He will not hesitate to take a life in pursuit of his goals.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_3_description: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns, before attacking with a sword. Penetrates Defense by 50%.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends the duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Requiemroar
description: A crazed Banshee dancing to a funeral dirge
story: A Banshee formed from a corrupted soul. She sings a bizarrely pleasant song of brutal murder and mourning. Her funeral dirge is for the enemy she is about to kill.
mission_specialty_description: Her requests, which you can never refuse, are becoming more and more unreasonable.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.

name: Researcher Carrot
description: A thorough researcher, seeking the truth behind magic
story: Carrot studied tirelessly to pass the notorious Magic Research Department exam and became a professional researcher. She thought things would finally get better once she passed, but instead, she feels like she has gotten even busier.
mission_specialty_description: All researchers develop an ability to write piles of reports without sleeping for several days.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases detonation chance to 100%.
Skill_2_description: After being attacked, grants the caster a barrier for 1 turn and burns the attacker for 1 turn. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Righteous Thief Roozid
description: A righteous thief who fights for those in need
story: After learning about wicked merchants from Savara bamboozling the Suin, Roozid resolves to restore the riches illicitly taken from them. He goes through intensive training and finally emerges anew.
mission_specialty_description: Not very popular, but a great cook. A self-taught chef from his days leading a group of nomads.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.

name: Rikoris
description: A kind, weak-hearted member of the Spear Club
story: A founding member of the Spear Club, Rikoris got caught up with Azalea and began helping out with the Public Security Club. He often lacks common sense, and is weak to the requests of others.
mission_specialty_description: He can't turn his back on anyone who asks for help.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.
Skill_2_description: Encourages all allies, increasing Speed for 2 turns.
Skill_2_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Encourages all allies, decreasing skill cooldown by 1 turn and increasing Speed for 2 turns.

name: Rima
description: A wandering minstrel with a talent for the bow
story: An energetic and cheerful girl, Rima is a master archer who spends her time as a wandering minstrel. Otherwise fearless and daring, she is terrified of mice.
mission_specialty_description: A beautiful melody can heal a weary body and soul.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a quick shot of an arrow. A critical hit will decrease the caster's skill cooldown by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Encourages an ally except for the caster, decreasing skill cooldowns by 3 turns.

name: Rin
description: A brave and stubborn young merchant girl
story: A brave and sturdy young girl, Rin was adopted by the great merchant Basar following the loss of her father, though she refuses to believe he is truly dead. She is full of ambition, but also good-natured with a strong sense of justice.
mission_specialty_description: Her cat eyes glow in the darkness.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Throws rings at the enemy, with a 75% chance to dispel one buff, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 15%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting one random buff for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Heals all allies with an elegant dance, granting two random buffs for 3 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the target's max Health.

name: Roaming Warrior Leo
description: A warrior roaming the world to eradicate evil
story: Born to a family of scholars, he dreamed of becoming a warrior from a young age. After his parents disappeared following a raid by the Axe Bandits, he pledged to become stronger and get his revenge. Believing that reforming the rotten world is the only way to become a true warrior, he roams around the world defeating evil.
mission_specialty_description: He will not falter in his determination to eradicate evil.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.

name: Roana
description: A nucleus with an unknown source of power, some say it can be used to move anything in the world.
story: A shaman of Rekos and Luluca's friend. Born with the Vigilant Eye, she is able to perceive the true nature of other beings. She visited Straze to confess her feelings for him, but in a tragic twist of fate, she was killed at his hand.
mission_specialty_description: Her cloudy eyes look deep into a being to see their true nature.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a noble power, granting a barrier to the ally with the lowest Health for 2 turns. Barrier strength increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants a barrier to all allies for 2 turns after attacking.
Skill_2_description: Recovers Health of all allies when an ally is attacked by an extra attack, counterattack, or Dual Attack, and increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 5% each per attacked ally. Amount recovered is proportional to the caster's max Health and the number of attacked allies.
Skill_3_description: With the grace of Rekos, grants revive to all allies for 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: With the grace of Rekos, recovers the Health of all allies and grants revive for 2 turns. Amount recovered increases proportional to the casters max Health.

name: Romann
description: Knight Commander of Lefundos, a sharp-tongued cynic
story: Knight Commander of Lefundos, situated in Eureka the Northern Continent. Romann has no desire to be king despite being the cousin and successor of the current king, Schniel. Cynical and assertive, yet weak to affection.
mission_specialty_description: A war hero who brought about many victories through careful strategizing.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.
Skill_2_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. Damage dealt increases when the enemy is buffed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Shoots a powerful gravity sphere at all enemies, dispelling all buffs and increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 50%. When the enemy is buffed, damage dealt increases and the enemy is inflicted with two poison effects for 2 turns, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by an additional 30%.

name: Roozid
description: A kind warrior of the Itan Clan who takes care of the sandcats
story: A quiet and kind young canine Suin of the Itan Clan, despite struggling to feed even himself, Roozid makes sure the sandcats of the Great Desert do not starve either. He admires Cartuja greatly.
mission_specialty_description: Not very popular, but a great cook. A self-taught chef from his days leading a group of nomads.
mission_attribute_description: Something special is required to sate their refined appetite.

name: Rose
description: Winning is the only way to survive! A warlike protector
story: A close aide of Cecilia's, Rose followed her all the way from Wintenberg. She loves to fight and has a good sense of humor. Her belief is that the strongest warrior die with no regrets.
mission_specialty_description: Fear won't ever stop her.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_3_soul_description: Extends duration of buffs granted by this skill by 1 turn.

name: Ruele of Light
description: A gentle saint shining with blessed light
story: An Heir of the Sixth World, Ruele is revered for her kindness. She is a Soul Weaver who gained the favor of the Lord of Light, Destina. Her only hobby is telling fortunes with rabbit fortune cookies.
mission_specialty_description: In her presence, even evil loses its darkness.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_1_description: Attacks the enemy with a staff before healing the ally with the lowest Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health, and amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health.
Skill_1_soul_description: Attacks the enemy before greatly healing all allies. Does not trigger a Dual Attack.
Skill_2_description: Summons a light pillar, dispelling all debuffs before recovering Health and granting a barrier for 2 turns. Amount recovered and barrier strength increase proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_description: Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering 50% of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Revives one dead ally with healing magic, recovering all of their Health before granting them invincibility for 1 turn. When this skill is used on a living ally, all of the ally's debuffs will be dispelled before the same effect is applied.

name: Sage Baal & Sezan
description: An otherworldly romantic with all kinds of knowledge
story: Sage Baal fell in love with an ordinary Human named Sezan and locked her soul in a doll to preserve her for himself forever. However, as time passed her soul eroded away, and eventually, she became simply a normal doll.
mission_specialty_description: He is willing to do anything and pay any price in order to obtain the knowledge he desires.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with an evil eye. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the caster's lost Health.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with an evil eye, recovering the caster to max Health when the enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the caster's lost Health.

name: Schuri
description: Brimming with confidence, it's the Explosive Gentleman
story: A master of gunpowder weaponry, Schuri has a strong sense of pride and arrogance, though suffers a complex about his weak physical strength.
mission_specialty_description: Sharp instincts separate truth from falsehood.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Shoots all enemies with a rifle. When the caster's stacked Focus is 3 or more, this skill is enhanced into Full Burst. A successful attack with Full Burst always results in a critical hit, decreasing Combat Readiness of all enemies by 30%.

name: Seaside Bellona
description: Ace of the Phantom CIC, brighter than the sun
story: Bellona has come to Reingar to help Karin and the Public Security Club cope with the influx of summer visitors. Although she claims she's here to watch over Sez, it seems her true goal is to relax in the resort.
mission_specialty_description: She won't tolerate anyone who disturbs her relaxing vacation.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Shares 30% of damage suffered by the caster with the foremost ally. When more than one damage sharing effect is granted, only the strongest effect is applied. The caster gains 1 Focus when an ally is attacked. When an ally is attacked and the caster's stacked Focus is 5, loses all Focus and activates You're Not Cute.\nYou're Not Cute	:	 Attacks all enemies with a fan, with a 50% chance to decrease Defense for 2 turns.

name: Serila
description: A glamorous witch who loves beautiful things
story: With her glamorous beauty and enchanting smile, she's the quintessential witch. She loves money, especially when using it to decorate herself with beautiful things. She doesn't go anywhere without her magical weapon, Chatty.
mission_specialty_description: Makes the impossible possible with their brilliance and genius.
mission_attribute_description: Everyone says it's impossible. Maybe it is.

name: Sez
description: A living weapon, the cynical Berserker
story: A cynical and quiet man, Sez Gaien is a living weapon known to many as \the Berserker.\" After gaining power from an Acolyte to escape the Homunculus experiments, he was branded a mass murderer and has been running ever since."
mission_specialty_description: Makes stupid comments and is always wasting time no matter how dire the situation.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_awakened_description: Penetrates the enemy with dark energy, making the enemy unhealable for 1 turn. Damage dealt increases proportional to the amount of the enemy's lost Health.
Skill_2_description: When the enemy's Health is 50% or less after attacking with Dark Shadow, an extra attack is granted against all enemies with a 50% chance to make them unhealable for 1 turn. Can only activate once per turn of the caster.
Skill_3_description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health. When the enemy dies, inflicts additional damage to all enemies proportional to the caster's Attack.

name: Shadow Rose
description: A protector walking the path of blood as a shadow of a precious thing
story: Rose was ready and willing to follow Cecilia anywhere, until she had her heart completely shattered. Now she is an obsessive and fiercely persistent war machine.
mission_specialty_description: True courage means facing your fears.
mission_attribute_description: Terror and darkness penetrate deep into your bones, rendering you immobile.
Skill_2_description: Leaps into the air and strikes at the enemy with a swordstorm, dispelling one buff and decreasing Defense for 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing the enemy's Combat Readiness by 25%.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with the Portent of Destruction, decreasing their Combat Readiness by 25%. Increases Combat Readiness of all allies by 25%.

name: Shooting Star Achates
description: A whimsical and lovable wandering healer
story: At best, a free spirit, at worst, an irresponsible hedonist. Shooting Star Achates finds a life without stimulus meaningless, and is always on the lookout for trouble.
mission_specialty_description: No matter how desperate the situation may be, she will always root for you.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Revives a dead ally with recovery magic. When the target is not dead, casts two random buffs for 3 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Revives a dead ally with recovery magic and grants immortality for 1 turn. When the target is not dead, grants immortality and two random buffs for 3 turns.
Skill_3_description: Dispels all debuffs from both the caster and target, and between the caster and the target, heals the ally with the lowest Health to the point that their Health matches the other, before healing further on top. Health matching effect is unaffected by healing buffs or debuffs. Additional healing increases proportional to the max Health of each ally.

name: Sigret
description: An envious Homunculus searching for redemption
story: Head of the Homunculus Unit, Sigret is a close friend of Friedrich's. She holds complicated feelings towards Mercedes, who resembles her past self.
mission_specialty_description: Commanders need remarkable insight and clear judgment.
mission_attribute_description: A skilled veteran leads your enemies.
Skill_3_description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. Penetrates Defense by 30%, with an additional 5% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts extinction when the enemy is defeated.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Inflicts lethal damage to the enemy, piercing their weak point. Penetrates Defense by 30%, with an additional 10% for each debuff inflicted on the enemy. Inflicts extinction when the enemy is defeated.

name: Silk
description: A gentle Elf walking within the Eternal Wind
story: A young Elf born in Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. At a young age Silk left the forest, meaning she knows little of her own race and her home. Her personality is bright and cheerful like a spring breeze.
mission_specialty_description: Maybe it sounds like wind, but it's really a song sent from the forest.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants an extra turn.
Skill_2_description: Gains 1 Focus at the end of the turn, and consumes 1 Focus when attacked. When the caster's stacked Focus is 2 or more, Single Shot is enhanced into Automatic Fire, increasing damage dealt.

name: Silver Blade Aramintha
description: Red scorpion of Savara who cuts through the sandstorms.
story: Commander of Savara's legendary Silver Blade Company. What began as a small group of people who had nowhere else to go gradually became greater in size thanks to Aramintha's charismatic leadership.
mission_specialty_description: Her mercenary company follows her every command.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Effect Chance increases to 100%, ignores Effect Resistance.
Skill_2_description: Activates Flame Release when the enemy is burned after using Flame Friction.\nFlame Release	:	 Attacks all enemies with mystic fire energy, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 20%.

name: Slime Jelly
description: When a slime is killed, it melts away and leaves behind jelly. It can be eaten in times of emergency.
story: An Elf of Dun Blyraia, Kiris left her home after losing her lover to the Archdemon War and joined the Sicar assassin organization. She is often absent-minded, but as you get to know her you discover she possesses an acute sense.
mission_specialty_description: Her attitude changes as soon as she begins pursuit.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Fires a corrosive volley to all enemies, extending any debuff duration by 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Strengthens the caster's next attack, increases Combat Readiness by 50%.\nVenomous Arrow	:	 Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.\nCorrosive Volley	:	 Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Strengthens the caster's next attack, granting an extra turn.\nVenomous Arrow	:	 Increases effect chance to 100%, and poison effects can be stacked up to 3 times.\nCorrosive Volley	:	 Extends debuff duration by 2 turns.

name: Sol
description: The Flame of Corruption\nwho scorches all enemies
story: A Gear-killer and bounty hunter who roams the world capturing wanted criminals. He boasts incredible fighting power, and while capable of harnessing all elements, he mainly sticks to Fire. He has a blunt and harsh way of speaking and prefers to use actions over words.
mission_specialty_description: Unless it's a special occasion, he likes to work alone.
Skill_1_description: Attacks an enemy with pillars of fire. Damage dealt increases when the enemy isn't buffed. Gains 20 Fighting Spirit when a Critical Hit is made.
Skill_2_description: Counterattacks and silences for 2 turns when an enemy uses a non-attack skill or when the caster is attacked by an Elite or Boss monster. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health. Can only activate once every 2 turns.\nRoman Cancel	:	 When the caster's Fighting Spirit is 100 at the end of an ally's turn, the caster consumes all Fighting Spirit and extends the duration of buffs granted to the caster before being granted an extra turn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a strong punch, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with a strong punch, dispelling all buffs before making them unable to be buffed for 2 turns. Damage dealt increases proportional to the enemy's max Health.

name: Specimen Sez
description: A violent butcher who threatens Sez's life
story: Researchers who barely escaped with their lives from Sez's murderous rampage built a new living weapon modeled after him. This new weapon seeks to kill Sez to prove its superiority and worth.
mission_specialty_description: He's looking for Sez to prove his superiority.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with an iron mace, with a 50% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Skill_2_description: Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 45% chance to stun for 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies with evil claws, with a 45% chance to stun for 1 turn, before increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a light storm, inflicting extinction and resetting cooldown for this skill when the enemy is defeated. Penetrates Defense by 30%, or by 100% when the enemy is stunned.

name: Specter Tenebria
description: A poisonous nightmare seeped in cruelty
story: While searching for a form that she liked, Tenebria enjoyed destroying people's minds. Her greatest joy came from watching them die from the poison of her illusions.
mission_specialty_description: Sometimes fulfilling desires can result in great things.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_soul_description: Grants an extra turn.
Skill_3_description: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks with a nightmare crystal, stunning for 1 turn. Decreases the Combat Readiness of all remaining enemies by 50% when an enemy dies. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on the enemy.

name: Surin
description: A calm and composed warrior from the East
story: Coming from the East with her sentient weapon Mann, Surin vaguely remembers the journey that brought her to Ritania, but nothing else. Following Mann's voice, she embarks on a journey to find her lost memories.
mission_specialty_description: She handles every situation as if she's handling a sword.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_description: Attacks with a chain axe. When the enemy is bleeding, causes two bleeding effects for 2 turns.
Skill_2_description: Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Batters the enemy with a chain axe and inflicts two to four bleeding effects for 2 turns, decreasing Attack for 1 turn.
Skill_3_description: Triggers all the bleeding effects currently inflicted on the enemy. Damage dealt increases proportional to the number of bleeding effects inflicted on the enemy, and debuff duration is extended by 1 turn. Additionally, the caster's Combat Readiness increases by 15% per every bleeding effect inflicted on the enemy. Effect can only be applied up to 5 times.

name: Sven
description: A native of Wetheric Moor, and leader of a new mercenary company
story: The leader of Wetheric Moor's new Strongman Company, Sven is straightforward and outgoing, with a goal to keep getting stronger. A hot-blooded young man who is likely training even now.
mission_specialty_description: Survival requires practice. Lots of practice.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_1_description: Attacks with dual-wielded swords, and triggers an extra attack when the caster's Health is 50% or less.\nExtra attack deals damage proportional to the caster's lost Health, and can only be activated once per turn of the caster.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies and inflicts huge damage, using 15% of Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's lost Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Attacks all enemies, dealing huge damage proportional to the enemy's lost Health.

name: Tamarinne
description: Appearing with a flash and the sound of singing!
story: An idol that brings joy and cheer through her electrifying music. She has great magical talent and can harness magic with her voice. She changes her appearance on stage with the Blooming Pendant and becomes more dynamic and lively.
mission_specialty_description: Her songs will fill you with overflowing power.
mission_attribute_description: An unhealthy mind poisons the soul.
Skill_1_description: (Tamarinne) Attacks an enemy with a serene melody and heals the ally with the lowest Health. Amount recovered increases proportional to the ally's max Health. Decreases cooldown of Shining Star by 1 turn.\n(Idol) Attacks all enemies with a beautiful voice, dispelling all buffs. Triggers a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack.
Skill_1_soul_description: Greatly recovers Health of all allies after attacking.
Skill_3_description: Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Before performing, dispels all debuffs inflicted on all allies and recovers the caster to max Health and grants an extra turn. The caster becomes an idol for 3 turns and performs a concert. Begins the first battle with full cooldown count.

name: Taranor Guard
description: A brave guard protecting Taranor
story: A member of the Taranor Guard. Unafraid of death, they will obey any order.
mission_specialty_description: They've honed their skills by confronting countless enemies.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.

name: Taranor Royal Guard
description: For Taranor! A soldier following any royal command
story: Soldiers responsible for guarding the King and Taranor Royal Palace, even as the energy of rebellion flows throughout Taranor, they remain faithfully loyal.
mission_specialty_description: As a soldier of the palace, they take pride in keeping order.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_3_description: Jumps towards the enemy and attacks them, dispelling all buffs. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Jumps towards the enemy and attacks them, dispelling all buffs and absorbing all damage as Health. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's max Health.

name: Tempest Surin
description: A determined young girl who has lost her country
story: A girl from a far eastern empire. As a warrior and daughter of a decorated general, she fought in several wars. However, as the empire fell, she was forced to flee to Ritania. With the help of a knight from Taranor she was able to adapt to this new life and now strives to pay back that favor.
mission_specialty_description: She inherited the weapon of her army general father and handles all of her work seriously.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.

name: Tenebria
description: The Phantom Queen who deals in cruel illusions
story: An Acolyte who freely deals out all kinds of illusions, Tenebria is known as the Phantom Queen. She bewilders her targets by overwhelming them with terrifying illusions or by taking on the appearance of others. Though she may look playful, she is monstrously cruel.
mission_specialty_description: Her smile turns dreams into nightmares.
mission_attribute_description: A swarm of enemies approaches, destroying everything.

name: Tieria
description: An adventurer of strange new lands who loves solitude
story: An adventurous woman, Tieria always chooses to travel in dangerous locations to satisfy her love for thrills. Her personality is calm and carefree, and she prefers to travel alone instead of dealing with other people. However, her beauty ensures she always attracts plenty of attention.
mission_specialty_description: She seeks adventure, but treads lightly.
Skill_3_description: Strikes the enemy, dealing damage proportional to the target's max Health.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Strikes the enemy strongly, dealing damage proportional to the target's max Health.

name: Troublemaker Crozet
description: A reckless knight surrounded by rumors and scandals
story: Crozet's Moonlight Shade who does as he pleases with no consideration for anyone around him. As a result, he has started causing a lot of trouble, leading the original Crozet to come looking for him.
mission_specialty_description: As of today, he has confessed his love to 486 different women.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases Effect chance by 60%.
Skill_3_description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Swears an oath of protection, dispelling all debuffs from the caster and one ally, before increasing Defense for 3 turns. Grants class enhancement to the ally for 3 turns.

name: Twisted Fang
description: A fang fragment of incomprehensible composition. It is said to contain the power of the outside world.
story: A  descendant of Suin taken as slaves by settlers from Ritania. He was able to earn his freedom at a young age thanks to the sacrifices of his family but had to become a street fighter in the criminal underground to survive. Just as he began opening up to others and finding inner peace, he lost all of his friends after his disciple Batisse went on a rampage. Now, he seeks revenge.
mission_specialty_description: He relentlessly pushes himself to his limits in order to become stronger.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_1_soul_description: Ignores Effect Resistance.
Skill_2_description: Attacks the enemy with wind pressure. Activates Wind Pressure again when an enemy is defeated. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_description: Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Releases energy to all allies, increasing Attack for 2 turns, before increasing Speed of the caster for 2 turns.

name: Tywin
description: Captain of the Lefundos Royal Guard, a model of faithful diligence
story: Captain of the Royal Guard of Lefundos, a kingdom situated in Eureka, Tywin holds the favor of his king Schniel. A hard worker, he values rule and order over all else, and gives off the impression that he will not listen to what you have to say.
mission_specialty_description: His incredible command ability boosts the efficiency of his troops.
Skill_2_description: Grants increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster and an ally for 2 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Grants increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster and an ally for 2 turns, and increases Combat Readiness by 30%.

name: Vildred
description: A paragon of righteousness and principle, a reliable companion of Ras's
story: Due to his humorous style of speaking, many mistake Vildred as being light-hearted, but he has a serious side that leads him to stubbornly push ahead with what he thinks is right.
mission_specialty_description: Under his sword, every ill will is brought to light.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_1_description: Rapidly attacks two enemies with a swordstorm. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_2_description: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and attacks all enemies one more time when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Increases Attack of the caster for 2 turns and attacks all enemies one more time when an enemy is defeated by Sweep or Blade Ascent. Increases Combat Readiness of the caster by 20% when an enemy is defeated.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with a swordstorm, dealing damage proportional to the caster's Speed.

name: Wanda
description: A temperamental young woman who hates to be bored
story: A girl from Reingar, Wanda is a curious young woman who gets bored of things very easily. Former student, nun, and mercenary, she is currently working as a self-styled treasure hunter... for now.
mission_specialty_description: Not enough time? Work faster.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.

name: Wanderer Silk
description: A fiercely proud Elf left alone in the Eternal Forest
story: An Elf born on the outskirts of Dun Blyraia, the Eternal Forest. Raised by the World Tree that pitied her, Silk is fiercely proud, but forever yearning for her people.
mission_specialty_description: She keeps on her toes, knowing danger lurks around every corner.
mission_attribute_description: null
Skill_2_description: Fires a volley of arrows at the enemy, decreasing Combat Readiness by 10%. Has a 50% chance of granting an extra attack of the same kind, increasing by an additional 50% when the target is debuffed. Damage is proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence for 2 turns and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Shoots an arrow infused with the power of lightning, inflicting silence and making them unhealable for 2 turns, and decreasing Combat Readiness by 100%. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed.

name: Watcher Schuri
