description: A secretive Sicar assassin
story: A member of the Sicar assassin organization, Watcher Schuri is an outstanding fighter, but ignorant of the ways of the world. Though his rigid way of speaking gives off an air of unapproachability, he is surprisingly straightforward and open to granting people's requests. However, he hides a secret he cannot share with others.
mission_specialty_description: He can see through everything.
mission_attribute_description: Someone's been tampering with evidence. Take a close look.
Skill_3_description: Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense by 80%.
Skill_3_soul_description: Skill cooldown is decreased by 2 turns.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Shoots a magic bullet at the enemy, penetrating their Defense.

name: Yufine
description: A lively Dragon girl who loves shiny things
story: Originally a Dragon of Wintenberg, through certain events Yufine eventually found her way to Ritania. Cheerful and curious, her excessive curiosity often leads to accidents. She loves shiny things so much that she tends to zone out while staring at them.
mission_specialty_description: She hangs around Garo quite often, so she hears a lot of things.
mission_attribute_description: It's not easy to understand knowledge from another world.
Skill_3_description: Hits the enemy with a finishing blow, dispelling all buffs and stunning for 1 turn.
Skill_3_awakened_description: Hits the enemy with a finishing blow, dispelling all buffs and stunning for 1 turn. Damage dealt is increased by 50% when the enemy is buffed.

name: Yuna
description: President of the Reingar Student Council, the school girl from another world
story: President of the Reingar Student Council and the chosen Heir by the Guardian, Kazran. Yuna is a high school girl who was summoned into this world. She is full of curiosity and obsessed with technology, constantly running experiments.
mission_specialty_description: She understands machinery well based on her strong affection towards it.
mission_attribute_description: It's nearly impossible to stay even for a moment in this hostile environment.
Skill_1_description: Attacks all enemies with a drone before increasing Combat Readiness of the caster by 6% per target and all other allies by 2% per target. Damage dealt increases proportional to the caster's Speed. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.
Skill_1_soul_description: Increases damage dealt.
Skill_2_description: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack for 2 turns.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Buffs all allies with a drone and increases Attack and Speed for 2 turns.
Skill_3_description: Attacks all enemies with an enormous and powerful cannon, inflicting huge damage. A successful attack always results in a critical hit. When there are three or fewer enemies, damage dealt increases with fewer enemies.

name: Zeno
description: A fanatical mage corrupted by endless desire
story: An emperor from another galaxy who was defeated in a tournament held by Notos. He obsessed over power and life, eventually binding his soul with that of a star and becoming transcendent. He now heads toward Orbis in search of the Monolith.
mission_specialty_description: Driven to steal away the Monolith with the infinite might of a star.
mission_attribute_description: A mission with a time limit. Be quick and accurate.
Skill_2_ehnhance_1_description: + 0.5% Defense, damage dealt by Ancient Beast
Skill_2_ehnhance_2_description: + 0.5% Defense, damage dealt by Ancient Beast
Skill_2_ehnhance_3_description: + 0.5% Defense, damage dealt by Ancient Beast
Skill_2_ehnhance_4_description: + 0.5% Defense, damage dealt by Ancient Beast
Skill_2_ehnhance_5_description: + 1% Defense, damage dealt by Ancient Beast

name: Zerato
description: A genius frost mage who will freeze everything
story: The frost mage of Reingar, Zerato is the second son of a Spirit Weaver clan, blessed by Nixied, the Lord of Winter. He's a genius who hates to feel hot, and loves showing off. Like most Reingar students he pays no attention to those things he deems unimportant, and often crosses the line in his study of magic.
mission_specialty_description: Gifted with natural talent and the blessing of Nixied, nobody can best him.
Skill_2_description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%.
Skill_2_awakened_description: Attacks the enemy repeatedly, increasing the caster's Combat Readiness by 50%. Damage dealt is increased when the enemy is debuffed.
